subject: Short-Track Speedskating
World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
Alpine Skiing
Biathlon
lead_paragraph: Marcel Hirscher and Anna Fenninger of Austria each captured final races in Lenzerheide, Switzerland, and overall World Cup titles Sunday.
snippet: Marcel Hirscher and Anna Fenninger of Austria each captured final races in Lenzerheide, Switzerland, and overall World Cup titles Sunday.
